mapper.select: select * from dwdm.dim_district order by district_id DESC LIMIT 30
select nation_id, dist_lvl_1 from dwdm.dim_district group by dist_lvl_1, nation_id order by nation_id, dist_lvl_1;
select dist_lvl_1, dist_lvl_2 from dwdm.dim_district group by dist_lvl_2, dist_lvl_1 order by dist_lvl_1, dist_lvl_2;
mapper.insert: insert into dwdm.dim_district (nation_id, dist_lvl_1, dist_lvl_2, dist_lvl_3, rgtr_id, updt_id) values (cast(#{nationId} as integer), #{distLvl1}, #{distLvl2}, #{distLvl3}, #{rgtrId}, #{updtId})
mapper.update: update dwdm.dim_district set nation_id = cast(#{nationId} as integer), dist_lvl_1 = #{distLvl1}, dist_lvl_2 = #{distLvl2}, dist_lvl_3 = #{distLvl3}, updt_dt = now(), updt_id = 'test2' where district_id = cast(#{districtId} as integer)
